translations: [地质]钟乳石（stalactite 的复数形式）；石钟乳

sentences.sentence: Most of the stalactites and stalagmites have their own names.
sentences.translation: 多数钟乳石和石笋都有自己的名字。

sentences.sentence: There was also a small waterfall with brightly colored stalactites.
sentences.translation: 还有一个小瀑布和一些有着明亮颜色钟乳石。

sentences.sentence: We tried to spot where the water was coming from and saw some great stalactites shining.
sentences.translation: 我们试图发现水从哪里来的，之后看到一些大型的钟乳石在闪光。
